title: fix-worktree-merge: Merge to parent branch
description: Update MergeManager to merge to parent branch instead of main
notes: 2026-01-22 07:18 - Completed 8kp: MergeManager.Merge() now uses ParentBranch from worktree metadata when available, with fallback to main. Warning printed when parent branch doesn't exist. Tests verify both behaviors work correctly.
